TopicTitle: B.A.T-Mo Plane! A Plane Fit for Batman!

Articles.Content:
Inspired by Kurtjmac\'s botched space plane in his latest episode, the B.A.T-Mo plane is a high-atmosphere plane with ridiculously large range and maneuverability for its unorthodox design!

Takeoff will occur at 130m/s, at which point gently pitch up. The under-mounted fuel tanks will last for approximately 150km and then will be jettisoned.

Mods required: NovaPunch, MechJeb (both quite standard mods)
'Oh, the Tumbler? You wouldn\'t be interested in that.'
